derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin receptivus, from recept- 'taken back', from the verb recipere (see receive)

entry.tran: （对新思想或建议）乐于接受的，能接纳的，善于听取的
entry.def: Someone who is receptive to new ideas or suggestions is prepared to consider them or accept them.

example.ex: The voters had seemed receptive to his ideas...
example.tran: 选民看上去很愿意接受他的想法。

example.ex: Do you think that there is any receptive audience for his remarks.
example.tran: 你觉得有人愿意接受他的言论吗？

entry.tran: （对治疗）反应良好的，能接纳的
entry.def: If someone who is ill is receptive to treatment, they start to get better when they are given treatment.

example.ex: ...those patients who are not receptive to treatment.
example.tran: 治疗未见效果的那些病人

means.word_mean: 1. open to arguments, ideas, or change;

sentences.sentence: "receptive to reason and the logic of facts"

means.word_mean: 2. ready or willing to receive favorably;
3. of a nerve fiber or impulse originating outside and passing toward the central nervous system;

auth_sentence.content: The Belgian Post Office was...receptive to MCI's ideas.

auth_sentence.res_content: Many apple growers have been receptive to the message.

auth_sentence.content: Kenyan authorities have been relatively receptive to the influx.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或物等"; 2. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: appreciate欣赏+ive……的→adj.感谢的,赞赏的
conjunct结合的,共同的+ive……的→adj.连接的
defect过失;缺点+ive……的→adj.有缺陷的
digest消化+ive……的→adj.消化的,有助消化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 教育的,教育性的,教育上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: educate教育,培养,训练+ive……的→educative教育的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
stems_affixes.word_buile: elect选举,推选+ive……的→adj.选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
imitate模仿+ive……的→imitative模仿的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指示的,预示的,可表示的
stems_affixes.word_buile: indicate指示+ive……的→adj.指示的,预示的,可表示的
introduce引入,介绍+ive……的→introductive序文的,介绍的
loco地方+mot动+ive……的→从一个地方动到另一个地方→adj.运动的,移动的,运载的
meditate想,考虑+ive……的→adj.沉思的,冥想的
recept接受+ive……的→adj.善于接受的
regenerate改过自新的+ive……的→regenerative再生的
relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive……的→relative相对的;相关的
subject主题+ive……的→adj.主观的,个人的
recuperate复原+ive……的→recuperative
capt抓+ive人或物等→抓住的人
defect过失;缺点+ive人或物等→n.有缺陷的人
fug逃+it走+ive人→n.逃犯,逃亡者
loco地方+mot动+ive物→从一个地方动到另一个地方→火车头
nat本土的+ive人或物等→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive人或物等→n.亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物

sentences.en: He is not very receptive to my suggestions.

jushi.english: His mind is receptive of〔to〕 new ideas.
He is not very receptive to my suggestions.
